Arn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the ReplicationSet.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-(cn|us-gov|iso(-b)?))?:[a-z-]+:(([a-z]+-)+[0-9])?:([0-9]{12})?:[^.]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
